channel.title: social on R-Ladies NYC
channel.description: Recent content in social on R-Ladies NYC

item.title: Summer Social
item.description: Come hang out with R-Ladies at the Royale Bar outdoor patio for an afternoon social full of fun, board games, and splendid R conversation! Drinks and food will be available for purchase. Collaborative, multi-player and two-player table games will be provided, but feel free to bring your own! Date: Saturday, July 13, 2019 Time: 2:00pm - 5:00pm Location: Royale, 157 Loisaida Ave, New York, NY, 10009 Meetup page

item.title: 2018 End of Year Social
item.description: Happy Holidays! For the end of the year we are looking to celebrate how far R-Ladies New York has come and thank all of you for your incredible support. Visit our Meetup page to RSVP. Details We are doing this potluck style so sign up here to bring something to the party! Dress in casual or holiday gear - we welcome it all! Date: Monday, December 10, 2018 Time: 6:30pm

item.title: Summer Social!
item.description: Let’s take a break from the heat and our desks for an R-Ladies summer social event! Visit our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP. Date: Saturday, July 8, 2017 Time: 2pm Where: Blue Ribbon Sushi Izakaya
